description: 1 Notice/Trap name: L2tp Tunnel is Up Or Down.
2 Notice/Trap generation cause: L2tp tunnel is up or down.
3 Repair suggestions: If the tunnel is down, please check out whether there is a error.

EventCategory.eval: ($v4 eq 'Up' || $v4 eq 'UP' || $v4 eq 'up') ? 1 : (($v4 eq 'Down' || $v4 eq 'DOWN' || $v4 eq 'down') ? 2 : 3)

Severity.eval: ($v4 eq 'Up' || $v4 eq 'UP' || $v4 eq 'up') ? 0 : (($v4 eq 'Down' || $v4 eq 'DOWN' || $v4 eq 'down') ? 4 : 2)

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelUpOrDown HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelID i 9999 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelStatus s Down

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelUpOrDown HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelID i 9999 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelStatus s Up

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelUpOrDown HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelID i 9999 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelStatus s EXAMPLE

description: The status of L2tp tunnel : Up/Down.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BRAS-L2TP-MIB::hwL2tpTunnelStatus
